articles.title: Triple Antiviral Combo May Speed COVID-19 Recovery - Medscape
articles.description: The combination of interferon-beta1, lopinavir/ritonavir, and ribavirin shortened median time to COVID-19 viral negativity by 5 days, according to results of an open-label, randomized phase 2 trial.
